info.name: Git Configuration - Detect
author: pdteam
pikpikcu
mah3sec_
m4lwhere
info.description: Git configuration was detected via the pattern /.git/config and log file on passed URLs.

request:
GET /.git/config HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8888
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:90.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/90.0
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 358
Content-Type: text/plain
Date: Tue, 10 Jun 2025 03:54:11 GMT

[core]
    repositoryformatversion = 0
    filemode = true
    bare = false
    logallrefupdates = true
[remote "origin"]
    url = https://github.com/example/private-repo.git
    fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
    remote = origin
    merge = refs/heads/master
[user]
    email = developer@example.com
    name = Developer Name
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:90.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/90.0' 'http://localhost:8888/.git/config'
